entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as a person who is checking Harry's list and offering him a birthday present. He is described as someone who has not gotten Harry a present yet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one whose list Hagrid is checking. He feels embarrassed when Hagrid offers to get him a birthday present.

entities.name: apothecary's
entities.description: The apothecary's store is where Harry and Hagrid are located. It is mentioned as the place where Harry's list is being checked.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Harry are at the apothecary's store.
Hagrid is offering to get a birthday present for Harry.
